questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided video of the equipment.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing report
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230
shift the equipment to another where wall outlet is provided with 230 VAC
check the continuity of power cord and confirm whether the power cord is defective
replace the power cord with a new one
check the Input AC fuses and confirm whether they are blown
replace the fuses with a new one
check for any carbon formation or breakage of power input pin connector.
clean or replace the power input pin connector
open the equipment as shown in the video, check for any loose connection of cable from input pin connector to transformer
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
check and confirm whether the transformer output voltage is available

videos.videoName: Video for checking the transformer O/P

questions.question: replace the transformer with a new one
check for any loose connection of cable from transformer to AC Relay
reseat or reconnect the cable again
replace the AC Relay with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the AC Relay

questions.question: Check and confirm whether sufficient pressure / pressure is delivered
, check and confirm whether there is any breakage, cracks, Loosens and debris formation in the tubing.
replace the tubing with a new one
check and confirm whether the jars / canister for any breakage, cracks / Damage
replace the jars / canister with a new one
check and confirm whether there is any burnt smell of motor or no running of motor after the equipment is ON
replace the motor with a new one
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
